Product description

An Amazon brand - Midweight flannel makes this button-up shirt a go-to pick when the temperature drops

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men’s must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort

      How are ratings calculated?
      To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzes reviews to verify trustworthiness.

      Donna
      5.0 out of 5 stars Runs large so size down. Barely shrunk in the dryer :-)
      Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2019
      Size: SmallColor: Black Buffalo PlaidVerified Purchase
      I'll be honest, I am skeptical of buying any clothing online, much less flannel that can shrink pretty drastically if it's made with cheap fabric. Without being able to feel the material and try it on for size, I don't like being bothered with the hassle of returning/exchanging. But I took a chance with this one and I'm glad I did. It fits perfect, even after washing! It barely shrank in the dryer. Using low heat, it retained almost all of its length.

      SIZING: These shirts run large, so size down. I haven't been a small in anything in my adult life and I'm glad I read in the description that the model in the pictures is 6'2" and wearing a medium. I am 2" shorter so I ordered a small and it fits perfectly.

      QUALITY: This is a soft medium weight flannel that seems to be made of higher quality material. As I said, it barely shrunk in the dryer so that leads me to believe the cotton isn't cheap. The patterns line up on the seams and on the chest pocket.

      BOTTOM LINE: I would definitely recommend this shirt. For the price, you'll be hard pressed to find a better quality shirt than this. I was so happy with the fit after washing that I immediately went online and bought three more. When I find a brand that fits me well, I tend to stick to it because being tall and thin, buying shirts is a challenge. I've attached two pictures for reference to length. They were taken after its first wash. I am 6' 165lbs. and I have a 32" waist and I'm wearing a small. I hope that helps
      Read more

      Chelsea
      5.0 out of 5 stars Winning Flannel!
      Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2018
      Size: X-LargeColor: Black Buffalo PlaidVerified Purchase
      The best flannels I have ever purchased, I purchased off Amazon this year for my brother for Christmas! It is difficult shopping online for flannel button ups because you can't see them and feel them in person (maybe I'm just super picky!). This is a perfect material--it is soft, thick and cozy without being too warm or being too thick that it is uncomfortable around the neck and under the armpits. It washes very well and stays soft. Looks great buttoned up or unbuttoned, it's a fantastic layering piece. The colors are vibrant & the plaid print stays sharp enough even after washing (sometimes after washing flannels, they end up becoming "fuzzy" from the cotton piling & the color and print fades, but have not had this issue with these). I love these flannels so much that I want to buy them in smaller sizes for myself!

      Drew31
      5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and well made
      Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2017
      Size: MediumColor: Black Buffalo PlaidVerified Purchase
      This is an excellent shirt. The texture is a brushed, soft finish that is very comfortable. I am 6 feet tall and weigh 190 pounds with a somewhat broad chest. A medium fit me well to provide a slim, well put together look without looking or feeling tight at all. The hem of the shirt hits just below the opening of my front pocket on my jeans. The armholes are tailored a bit higher than you would find on a "work" flannel and are more consistent with a dress shirt style. That isn't to say that this flannel is restrictive in any way. It is comfortable with enough room to move around and do any routine tasks. I probably wouldn't wear this if you plan on chopping wood or doing something really upper body intensive though. The stitching appears to be solid but I will have to wear it for a while to see how it holds up over time. I am a bit disappointed that Amazon doesn't provide a fit guide or sizing chart for their own products. Those are very common among other brands and it would certainly help others feel more confident in their purchase. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a casual flannel that doesn't want something overly baggy or super-slim.

      ***UPDATE***
      The sizing chart link is available on the desktop web interface of the site, however that link is absent on the mobile app (what I used to purchase the shirt).

      Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2017

      Pros

      Andrew Sipe
      4.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality shirt with small buttons and runs about a half size larger than expected.
      Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2017
      Size: MediumColor: Red/Grey PlaidVerified Purchase
      The combination of an Amazon Essentials branding and the price tag of $18, I was expecting a nice, low quality shirt. Nothing spectacular, but at least utilitarian. I was pleasantly surprised to find the quality of the shirt was better than expected. The wool is very soft to the touch, and a noticeable thickness that doesn't seem to add to the weight. The buttons aren't as nice and rather small in my opinion (3/8" wide). I ordered a medium (typically what I wear), and feel the overall size is larger than a medium. The sleeves are long and the shirt length is also rather long (obviously intended to be tucked in). I tried it on and then washed in. Hoping it might shrink a bit (I wash and rinse in cold water), but it didn't in my case.

      All said and done, I'm like it and will be keeping it.
